 I. <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎פָּסַח‎</span> **verb** ==pass or spring over==; — 

**Qal** ***Perfect*** 3 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎פ‎</span> [[Exod.12.27|Exod 12:27]], <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וּפ‎</span> consecutive V:23 ([[BDB#J|J]]); 1 singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וּפָסַחְתִּ֫י‎</span> v[[Exod.12.13|Exod 12:13]] ([[BDB#P|P]]), all with <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עַל‎</span>, of <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎י‎</span> ***passing over*** (sparing) houses of Israel; ***Infinitive absolute*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎פָּסוֺחַ‎</span> [[Isa.31.5|Isa 31:5]] ***a passing over*** (SC. <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עַליְֿרוּשָׁלַםִ‎</span>). 



 II. [<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎פָּסַח‎</span>] **verb** ==limp== ([[BDB#Thes|Thes]] below I. <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎פ‎</span> but dubious; Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> is ***dislocate***; according to [[BDB#Gerber|Gerber]]<sup>73</sup> II. <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎פ‎</span> is denominative from <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎פִּסֵּחַ‎</span> [and this below I. <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎פ‎</span>?]); — 

**Qal** ***Participle*** plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎פֹּסְחִים עַלשְֿׁתֵּי הַסְּעַפִּים‎</span> [[1Kgs.18.21|1Kgs 18:21]] figurative (see [ <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎סְעִפָּה‎</span>]). **Niph\`al** ***Imperfect*** 3 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וַיִּפֹּל וַיִּפָּסֵחַ‎</span> [[2Sam.4.4|2Sam 4:4]] ***and he fell and was made limping*** (lame). **Pi\`el** ***Imperfect*** 3 masculine plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וַיְפַסְּחוּ עַלהַֿמִּזְבֵּחַ‎</span> [[1Kgs.18.26|1Kgs 18:26]] ***they went limping*** (along by the altar), i.e. probably in their dance, see [[BDB#Kit|Kit]] [[BDB#Pietschm|Pietschm]]<sup>Phön. 220</sup> ([[BDB#Gr|Gr]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ויפסעו‎</span> [ = <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וַיִּפְשְׂעוּ‎</span>] ***stepped***).
